mapper.select: select distinct p.p_no, p.p_supply, p.p_name, p.p_content, p.p_price, p.p_sale, p.p_image_m, p.p_image_s, p.p_pdate, p.p_country, p.p_entry from items i inner join product p on i.p_no = p.p_no where category_no= (select category_no from category where category_name=#{category_name})

select distinct p.p_no, p.p_supply, p.p_name, p.p_content, p.p_price, p.p_sale, p.p_image_m, p.p_image_s, p.p_pdate, p.p_country, p.p_entry from items i inner join product p on i.p_no = p.p_no where sex_no= (select sex_no from sex where sex_name=#{sex_name})

select distinct p.p_no, p.p_supply, p.p_name, p.p_content, p.p_price, p.p_sale, p.p_image_m, p.p_image_s, p.p_pdate, p.p_country, p.p_entry from items i inner join product p on i.p_no = p.p_no where brand_no= (select brand_no from brand where brand_name=#{brand_name})
select * from product where p_no = #{ p_no }
mapper.insert: insert into product( p_supply, p_name, p_content, p_price, p_sale, p_image_m, p_image_s, p_pdate, p_country, p_entry ) values( #{p_supply}, #{p_name}, #{p_content}, #{p_price}, #{p_sale}, #{p_image_m}, #{p_image_s}, #{p_pdate}, #{p_country}, now() )
mapper.update: update product set p_supply=#{p_supply}, p_name=#{p_name}, p_content=#{p_content}, p_price=#{p_price}, p_sale=#{p_sale}, p_image_m=#{p_image_m}, p_image_s=#{p_image_s}, p_pdate=#{p_pdate}, p_country=#{p_country} where p_no=#{p_no}
mapper.delete: delete from product where p_no=#{ p_no }
